title: [Large-scale] Capacity Building for Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) Based on Education 4.0

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mechanical/electrical engineering knowledge and fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Aims to bridge the digital skills gap among in-service professionals, focusing on solving real industrial problems in simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze work processes applying Industry 4.0 core technologies (digital twin, IoT) in VR simulation environments
Learners can design collaborative solutions addressing real-world industrial problems through project-based learning
Learners can demonstrate digital tool proficiency and problem-solving competencies with over 80% success rates in simulation-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
